Module.Name: Substance approvals
Module.Description: Substance approvals specify which substances are approved within the definition under regulation (EC) No 1107/2009. This information may, for instance, be used to to restrict water imputation to approved substances only.
Module.ShortDescription: Substance approvals specify which substances are approved within the definition under regulation (EC) No 1107/2009.
Module.DataDescription: Substance approvals are specified as data in the form of a list of approved substances. Substances not on the list are assumed to be not approved.
